forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
